args: & { $candidates = @(); $candidates += Get-ChildItem -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue (Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles 'Microsoft Visual Studio\*\*\Common7\Tools\Launch-VsDevShell.ps1'); $pf86 = [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable('ProgramFiles(x86)'); if ($pf86) { $candidates += Get-ChildItem -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue (Join-Path $pf86 'Microsoft Visual Studio\*\*\Common7\Tools\Launch-VsDevShell.ps1') }; $launcher = $candidates | Select-Object -First 1; if ($launcher) { $tools = Split-Path -Parent $launcher.FullName; $common7 = Split-Path -Parent $tools; $vsInstall = Split-Path -Parent $common7; & $launcher.FullName -VsInstallationPath $vsInstall -SkipAutomaticLocation -Arch amd64 -HostArch amd64 | Out-Null; Write-Host ('DevShell loaded: ' + $vsInstall) } else { Write-Warning 'Launch-VsDevShell.ps1 not found. Install Visual Studio (or Build Tools) to get MSBuild for XAML class libraries.' } }
